title: Reinforcement Learning-Based Personalized Instructional Design for Optimizing Brain-Computer Interface Training

context.prior_knowledge: Basic principles of BCI, foundational machine learning, and Python programming experience
context.additional_context: There is a significant variation in learners' BCI proficiency levels, necessitating personalized strategy development through individual training data analysis.

learning_goals: Acquire the ability to generate personalized BCI training sequences using the PAID algorithm.
Design user-specific task sequence optimization strategies applying reinforcement learning models.

Learners can execute three scenarios (e.g., customer service, inventory management, crisis response) applying the PAID strategy (Proactive, Adaptive, Interactive, Dynamic) in a simulated environment and produce an analytical report demonstrating a 15%+ improvement in at least two of three performance metrics (processing time, accuracy, user satisfaction) per scenario.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
